name: Continuum (2020)
description:
http://continuum2020.ca

Remake of the popular massively multiplayer space-shooter (Continuum or also known as Subspace Continuum).

I wasn't able to complete this in time but I'm hoping to continue working on it in my spare time.

My plans for future updates:

- Implement Elim (same as ?go elim). If you're not familiar with continuum, this is a free-for-all style match. You start with 10 lives and last man standing wins.

- Implement Team Deathmath (same as ?go twdd). 5v5 or 4v4 games. Each player has 10 lives and last team standing wins.

- Graphics and adding rocks, add small radar map.
